original_title: Go! Anpanman: Fluffy Flurry And The Land Of Clouds
overview: Do you know where clouds come from? They come from a mysterious place called “Land of Clouds”! A baby cloud that was born in the Land of Clouds run across Baikinman and Dokinchan. After meeting them, the baby gets the name Flurry and quickly grows while developing a bond with Dokinchan. One day, the Land of Clouds cannot float on the sky because of a strange stain. At the same time, Baigumora, the monster that created by Baikinman, is out of control! Can Anpanman protect the Land of Cloud?
title: Go! Anpanman: Fluffy Flurry And The Land Of Clouds
